## IRouter.findRecordByKey() method

用`唯一key`<!-- -->来查找某条路由记录，如果没找到则返回 `{overflow: true}`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findRecordByKey(key: string): {
        record: IRouteRecord;
        overflow: boolean;
        index: [number, number];
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ record: [IRouteRecord](./react-taro.irouterecord.md)<!-- -->; overflow: boolean; index: \[number, number\]; }
